game.title: The Lost City of Eldarado
game.objective: Find the fabled city of gold and retrieve an ancient artifact.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden city deep in the jungle, filled with treasures beyond your wildest dreams. Your quest is to find this city and retrieve a powerful artifact said to be hidden within its walls.

task.objective: Gather information about the Lost City of Eldarado.
task.description: Talk to Professor Wimpole and gather as much information as possible about the lost city. He may have some clues that will aid you in your quest.

task.objective: Retrieve an ancient map from the dusty archives of the university library.
task.description: Rummage through the old bookshelves and dusty archives to find a tattered map that supposedly leads to the lost city.

task.objective: Venture into the heart of the jungle and follow the map to the Lost City of Eldarado.
task.description: Brave the dangers of the jungle, including vicious predators and treacherous terrain. The journey will be arduous, but the reward will be worth it.
